Uses of Package
mansfield.edu.jphillip.maze

Classes in mansfield.edu.jphillip.maze used by mansfield.edu.jphillip.maze
AView
          MVC View: sets up a GUI view for the application.
ControlPanel
          MVC View: displays a panel containing various controls allowing the player to control the look and feel of the game.
DrawingPanel
          MVC View: displays a panel that draws the maze and player pieces.
MazeBoard
          MVC Model: generates a maze board as a 2D array of chars.
MazeBoardFiles
          MVC Model: generates a list of maze file names.
MazeBoardInterface
          MVC Model: interface defining methods all maze board generators will have.
MazeMidi
          MVC Model: plays a midi music file given a filename.
MazeMidiFiles
          MVC Model: retrieves a midi music filename.
MazeRobot
          MVC Model: represents a robot player that wanders through the maze.
MazeShape
          MVC Model: abstract class for player shape and image icons.
MazeSound
          MVC Model: sets up and plays short sound clips.
